title: Biomin.net
description: As an animal nutrition company, BIOMIN develops and produces feed additives, premixes and services for healthy and profitable animals.
cleaned_text: Avian nutrition, chicken feed supplements and poultry feed additives for top performing, healthy flocks. Swine nutrition, pig feed additives and hog supplement solutions for high performance at every phase. Ruminant nutrition and feed additives for achieving top milk and meat production. Aquaculture nutrition and feed additives for sustainable shrimp and fish. Protect your animals with high tech additives and on-site support. BIOMIN Mycotoxin Survey data, detection services and state-of-the-art mycotoxin deactivation. Unique, proprietary technologies that help your animals to achieve top results. Phytogenic feed additives, probiotics, acidifiers and more. Advanced nutrition to support your animals at every stage. Premixes, mineral feeds and specialties.
